summary: An ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to purchase Ten Thousand ($10,000) Dollars Los Angeles County Sanitary District No. 1 5 1/2s, due May 1, 1932, at $104.2803, and accrued interest, and appropriating Ten Thousand Six Hundred and Fifty ($10,650) Dollars, or as much thereof as may be necessary from the Water Bonds Sinking Fund.
